universal_guidelines: FILE EXTENSION: Use .js or .jsx for all React files. DO NOT use .ts or .tsx.
NO TYPESCRIPT: Do not include interfaces or type definitions in the code.
MOBILE FIRST: Always design for 375px width first, then scale up.
TOUCH TARGETS: Ensure all interactive elements are at least 44x44px.
DARK MODE ONLY: The app is strictly dark mode. Do not implement light mode toggles.
GLASSMORPHISM: Use the .glass utility class for overlays, modals, and the bottom navigation bar.
DATA-TESTID: All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute (e.g., data-testid='trade-button').
NO SCROLLBARS: Hide scrollbars in horizontal lists but allow scrolling (scrollbar-hide utility).
TEXT CONTRAST: Ensure text is never pure white (#ffffff) on pure black. Use #f8fafc (slate-50) on #0f0f10.
ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for page transitions and complex interactions. Use CSS transitions for hover states.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'BULL SAGE' PWA. Focus on the 'Academy' and 'Dashboard' first. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Bottom Navigation' as the primary navigation method. Ensure the 'AI Cockpit' feels distinct with the Violet color scheme. Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to maintain brand consistency. When creating the 'Trading Mode', prioritize data density but keep it readable on mobile.
